properties.description: Validation notebook for validating curated layer tables against the json schema.

source: ### Validation notebook for validating curated layer tables against the json schema

import pandas as pd
import json
from collections import defaultdict
import pprint
from jsonschema import validate, FormatChecker, ValidationError, Draft202012Validator
from iso8601 import parse_date, ParseError

DATABASE = "odw_curated_db"
TABLE = "document_meta_data"
QUERY = f"SELECT * FROM `{DATABASE}`.`{TABLE}` limit 5"

#### json schema for the relevant entity

This needs pasting here manually from https://github.com/Planning-Inspectorate/data-model/tree/main/schemas as the spark pool is using python 3.8 and the schema package was written using python 3.11 and there are incompatibilities so the package can't be imported.

#### Create dataframe of the data from the table

For certain tables it may be necessary to rename a column or two in order to create the array and avoid duplicate field names

#### Validate against the schema

The validate variable can then be returned as the exit value of the notebook

#### Set notebook exit value to the validate variable above

True for successful validation
False for faield validation
